body.p: This week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter proudly presents the new Gentoo/OpenSolaris project, a pre-announcement of the kernel profiles changing with the upcoming 2005.0 release, some details on the sale of Genesi's Open Desktop Workstations, and last but not least: picture proof of Gentoo Linux/PPC running on Apple's Mac Minis! The Future zone looks at changes planned for the Forums, Gentoo International draws your attention to two events, the Gentoo developer meeting at FOSDEM in Brussels, and a security conference with Gentoo developer participation in Harrisburg, PA. And don't forget to have a look at the Gentoo in the press section, tips & tricks, and our security announcements and Bugzilla statistics!
